project.name: Canteen Database API
project.description: Abstract mysqli library for use with the Canteen Framework.

Database.name: Database
Database.description:
Abstract database connection. Use's the mysqli API.

	$db = new Database('localhost', 'root', '12341234', 'my_database');

params.name: host
params.description: The database host

params.name: username
params.description: The database user

params.name: password
params.description: The database password

params.name: databases
params.description: The database name aliases as key=>names, or a single database name string

params.name: code
params.description: The code of the error

params.name: data
params.description: The extra data to pass with the error

params.name: db
params.description: Reference to the database

params.name: tables
params.description: The tables to delete from

DropQuery.name: DropQuery
DropQuery.description:
Represent the query to drop a table

	$dropped = $db->drop('users')->result();

params.name: Reference
params.description: to the database

params.name: The
params.description: single table name

IDatabaseCache.name: IDatabaseCache
IDatabaseCache.description: Interface for the external database cache, optional

InsertQuery.name: InsertQuery

params.name: db
params.description: Reference to the database

params.name: tables
params.description: The tables to insert into

Query.name: Query
Query.description:
The abstract class that all queries extend
this is base API for creating database queries

params.name: db
params.description: The reference to the database connection

QueryResult.name: QueryResult
QueryResult.description: The object when doing multiple queries or pooling

params.name: sql
params.description: The query to execute

params.name: The
params.description: type of query 'getLength', 'getRow', 'getResult', 'getArray', 'execute'

params.name: field
params.description: Optional field name for getResult type only

params.name: position
params.description: Optional position for getResult type only

params.name: db
params.description: Reference to the database

params.name: tables
params.description: The properties as array or list of args or string

params.name: Reference
params.description: to the database

params.name: The
params.description: optional database name, default is to use the current database

TruncateQuery.name: TruncateQuery
TruncateQuery.description:
Represent the query to remove all contents of a table

	$truncated = $db->truncate('users')->result();

params.name: db
params.description: Reference to the database

params.name: table
params.description: The single table name

params.name: db
params.description: Reference to the database connection

params.name: tables
params.description: The tables to insert into (array, string or list of arguments)
